00065 void AnaMeasResult::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00066 {
00067    fprintf(f, "$rc['max_rate']            = %f;\n",            max_rate);
00068    fprintf(f, "$rc['TshiftAve']           = %f;\n",            TshiftAve);
00069    fprintf(f, "$rc['wcm_norm_event_rate'] = %f;\n",            wcm_norm_event_rate);
00070    fprintf(f, "$rc['UniversalRate']       = %f;\n",            UniversalRate);
00071    fprintf(f, "$rc['A_N']                 = array(%f, %f);\n", A_N[0], A_N[1]);
00072    fprintf(f, "$rc['P']                   = array(%f, %f);\n", P[0], P[1]);
00073    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAnaPower']           = %s;\n",            PairAsPhpArray(fAnaPower).c_str());
00074    fprintf(f, "$rc['fPolar']              = %s;\n",            PairAsPhpArray(fPolar).c_str());
00075    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAvrgPMAsym']         = %s;\n",            PairAsPhpArray(fAvrgPMAsym).c_str());
00076    fprintf(f, "$rc['fProfilePolarMax']    = %s;\n",            PairAsPhpArray(fProfilePolarMax).c_str());
00077    fprintf(f, "$rc['fProfilePolarR']      = %s;\n",            PairAsPhpArray(fProfilePolarR).c_str());
00078    // Skip fit results fFitResAsymPhi fFitResPolarPhi ...
00079    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAsymX90']            = %s;\n",            MapAsPhpArray<string, ValErrPair>(fAsymX90).c_str());
00080    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAsymX45']            = %s;\n",            MapAsPhpArray<string, ValErrPair>(fAsymX45).c_str());
00081    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAsymX45T']           = %s;\n",            MapAsPhpArray<string, ValErrPair>(fAsymX45T).c_str());
00082    fprintf(f, "$rc['fAsymX45B']           = %s;\n",            MapAsPhpArray<string, ValErrPair>(fAsymX45B).c_str());

00085    fprintf(f, "$rc['P_sigma_ratio_norm']  = array(%f, %f);\n", P_sigma_ratio_norm[0], P_sigma_ratio_norm[1]);
00086    fprintf(f, "$rc['energy_slope']        = array(%f, %f);\n", energy_slope[0], energy_slope[1]);
00087    fprintf(f, "$rc['profile_error']       = %f;\n",            profile_error);
00088 
00089    fprintf(f, "$rc['sinphi']              = array(");

00091    for (int i=0; i!=1; i++) {
00092 
00093       fprintf(f, "%d => array ('P' => %f, 'PErr' => %f, 'dPhi' => %f, 'dPhiErr' => %f, 'chi2' => %f)\n",
00094          i, sinphi[i].P[0], sinphi[i].P[1], sinphi[i].dPhi[0], sinphi[i].dPhi[1], sinphi[i].chi2);
00095    }
00096

00107 ValErrPair AnaMeasResult::GetPCPolar() const
00108 {
00109    ValErrPair val_err(0, -1);
00110 
00111    if (fFitResPolarPhi.Get()) {
00112       val_err.first  = fFitResPolarPhi->Value(0);
00113       val_err.second = fFitResPolarPhi->FitResult::Error(0);
00114    } else {
00115       Error("GetPCPolar", "No valid polar vs phi fit result found");
00116    }
00117 
00118    return val_err;
00119 }

00123 ValErrPair AnaMeasResult::GetPCPolarPhase() const
00124 {

00127    if (fFitResPolarPhi.Get()) {
00128       val_err.first  = fFitResPolarPhi->Value(1);
00129       val_err.second = fFitResPolarPhi->FitResult::Error(1);
00130    } else {
00131       Error("GetPCPolarPhase", "No valid polar vs phi fit result found");
00132    }
00133 
00134    return val_err;

00144       val_err.first  = fFitResProfilePvsI->Value(1);
